arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will take on Roma in the 10th round of Serie A on Sunday evening. In front of a sold-out San Siro, the Rossoneri will be looking to leapfrog the Giallorossi. arts.ttl: MN: Jashari and Tomori called up for Milan vs. Roma – only three absences

arts.ttl: Official: Guida to officiate Milan vs. Roma – many precedents and a positive record
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Marco Guida has been named as the referee for AC Milan’s game against Roma on Sunday evening. It certainly won’t be the 44-year-old’s first rodeo. Milan need to bounce back with a win tomorrow, following two consecutive draws, but Roma are expected to make life difficult for the Rossoneri. arts.ttl: Milan vs Roma: defense likely to decide a tight battle at San Siro
arts.sum: With the first midweek round now over, we return to action earlier than usual this season due to Milan’s absence from European competitions.
